ProjectTitle: Oxytocin therapy in children with autism spectrum disorder and co-occurring intellectual disability: examination of desirability, clinical efficacy and therapeutic augmentation by psychosocial training
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/04/2024
When sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. If this is not possible please use RDR where you can restrict access, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard. When publishing data in OSF please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (for RDR this will be registered automatically), see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
